content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":219532,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我が国はこういう状態だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is the situation in our country."},{"lineNumber":219533,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は魔王退治に","translatedEnglishLine":"  At the moment, we cannot"},{"lineNumber":219534,"originalJapaneseLine":"　協力することは出来ない」","translatedEnglishLine":"  cooperate in defeating the Demon Lord.\""},{"lineNumber":219535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その上で申し訳ないが、しばしの間、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That said, I apologize, but for a short while,"},{"lineNumber":219536,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リセットを借りても構わないだろうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"  would it be alright to borrow Reset's help?\""},{"lineNumber":219537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ことが終わり次第、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Once this matter is resolved,"},{"lineNumber":219538,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐに僕も君達の旅に参加すると約束しよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"  I promise I will join your journey immediately.\""},{"lineNumber":219539,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すまない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm sorry.\""},{"lineNumber":219540,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむむむむ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmmmmm...\""},{"lineNumber":219541,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうやら乱義を仲間にするには、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It seems that to have Rangii join us,"},{"lineNumber":219542,"originalJapaneseLine":"　早雲って奴をどうにかする必要があるらしいな」","translatedEnglishLine":"  we have to do something about that guy named Souun.\""},{"lineNumber":219543,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":219544,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、マジか、＜エール＞」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, seriously, <Yell>!\""},{"lineNumber":219545,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へへっ、仕方ねーな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":219546,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺も付き合ってやるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"  I'll come along too.\""},{"lineNumber":219547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今回はそんな危険なことなさそうだしな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This time it doesn't seem like something too dangerous!\""},{"lineNumber":219548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、この流れで！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, in this situation!?\""},{"lineNumber":219549,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺達も協力するぜって流れかと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought it was the flow where we also say we'll cooperate...\""},{"lineNumber":219550,"originalJapaneseLine":"「協力？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Cooperate?\""},{"lineNumber":219551,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、しかし、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, but,"},{"lineNumber":219552,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そこまで助けてもらうわけには……」","translatedEnglishLine":"  we can't have you helping us that much...\""},{"lineNumber":219553,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいんじゃない？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn't it fine?"},{"lineNumber":219554,"originalJapaneseLine":"　助けてもらえば」","translatedEnglishLine":"  If you get some help.\""},{"lineNumber":219555,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そーそー、兄弟なんだし。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah yeah, we're brothers after all."},{"lineNumber":219556,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私達も一緒に戦うよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"  We'll fight together too, you know?\""},{"lineNumber":219557,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、今更戻ってきた」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, you came back just now.\""},{"lineNumber":219558,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへー、だって面倒だったんだもん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehehe, it was just troublesome, you know.\""},{"lineNumber":219559,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":219560,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はあ、分かった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ha, I understand.\""},{"lineNumber":219561,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆の協力、心より感謝する」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I sincerely appreciate everyone's cooperation.\""},{"lineNumber":219562,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとう、＜エール＞」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you, <Yell>.\""},{"lineNumber":219563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、それにしてもすごかっただすだ、乱義様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, but even so, that was amazing, Lord Rangii.\""},{"lineNumber":219564,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれだけの強面の方々相手に、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Against all those intimidating people,"},{"lineNumber":219565,"originalJapaneseLine":"　堂々とかつハキハキと指示を出し……","translatedEnglishLine":"  you gave clear and confident orders..."},{"lineNumber":219566,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うう、おら感動いたしましただ」","translatedEnglishLine":"  Ugh, I was truly moved.\""},{"lineNumber":219567,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よしてください、ロッキーさん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please stop, Rocky-san."},{"lineNumber":219568,"originalJapaneseLine":"　既に僕は国主なのです。","translatedEnglishLine":"  I am already the lord of this country."},{"lineNumber":219569,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この程度出来て当然のこと」","translatedEnglishLine":"  Doing this level of thing is natural.\""},{"lineNumber":219570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいえ！　まっことご立派ですぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No! Truly, that was splendid!\""},{"lineNumber":219571,"originalJapaneseLine":"「左様！　なんとも堂々とした立ち居振る舞い！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Indeed! Such a dignified bearing!\""},{"lineNumber":219572,"originalJapaneseLine":"「見ているだけで！　この爺は、爺は！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just watching! This old man, this old man!\""},{"lineNumber":219573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおおおーーーっ！！！！×３」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wooooahhhh!!! (×3)\""},{"lineNumber":219574,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……３Ｇ、そういうのを身内びいきと言うんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...3G, that's called nepotism.\""},{"lineNumber":219575,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まだまだ、僕は香様の足下にも及んでない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm still nowhere near Lady Kaoru's level."},{"lineNumber":219576,"originalJapaneseLine":"　精進しなければ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"  I must keep improving...\""},{"lineNumber":219577,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この国の皆の為にも、ね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"For the sake of everyone in this country, too.\""},{"lineNumber":219578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":219579,"originalJapaneseLine":"「顔のいい奴は大抵悪党っつったけど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They say that good-looking guys are usually villains, but...\""},{"lineNumber":219580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ？　もしかしていい奴かも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? Maybe he's actually a good guy...\""},{"lineNumber":219581,"originalJapaneseLine":"長田君はちょろかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Nagata-kun was easily swayed."},{"lineNumber":219582,"originalJapaneseLine":"「香様に？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To Lady Kaoru?\""},{"lineNumber":219583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せっかくだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Since we're at it,"},{"lineNumber":219584,"originalJapaneseLine":"　挨拶していきたいんだけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"  I want to go greet her,"},{"lineNumber":219585,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今は大丈夫かな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"  but is now a good time?\""},{"lineNumber":219586,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、そうだね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, yeah."},{"lineNumber":219587,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今、案内しよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"  I'll guide you now.\""},{"lineNumber":219588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞、君達もよければ","translatedEnglishLine":"\"<Yell>, if you want,"},{"lineNumber":219589,"originalJapaneseLine":"　挨拶していくといい」","translatedEnglishLine":"  you should also go say hello.\""},{"lineNumber":219590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「香様は客人をもてなすのが好きだから、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lady Kaoru likes to entertain guests,"},{"lineNumber":219591,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっとお喜びになる」","translatedEnglishLine":"  so she will surely be pleased.\""}]}

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is the situation in our country.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 協力することは出来ない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: cooperate in defeating the Demon Lord."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その上で申し訳ないが、しばしの間、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That said, I apologize, but for a short while,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットを借りても構わないだろうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would it be alright to borrow Reset's help?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに僕も君達の旅に参加すると約束しよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I promise I will join your journey immediately."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうやら乱義を仲間にするには、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems that to have Rangii join us,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲って奴をどうにかする必要があるらしいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we have to do something about that guy named Souun."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺も付き合ってやるか」
「今回はそんな危険なことなさそうだしな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This time it doesn't seem like something too dangerous!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺達も協力するぜって流れかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought it was the flow where we also say we'll cooperate..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまで助けてもらうわけには……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we can't have you helping us that much..."
We'll fight together too, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへへー、だって面倒だったんだもん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehehe, it was just troublesome, you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、それにしてもすごかっただすだ、乱義様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, but even so, that was amazing, Lord Rangii."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれだけの強面の方々相手に、
堂々とかつハキハキと指示を出し……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you gave clear and confident orders...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うう、おら感動いたしましただ」
「よしてください、ロッキーさん。
既に僕は国主なのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am already the lord of this country.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この程度出来て当然のこと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doing this level of thing is natural."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいえ！　まっことご立派ですぞ！」
「左様！　なんとも堂々とした立ち居振る舞い！」
「見ているだけで！　この爺は、爺は！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just watching! This old man, this old man!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……３Ｇ、そういうのを身内びいきと言うんだよ」
「まだまだ、僕は香様の足下にも及んでない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm still nowhere near Lady Kaoru's level.
"For the sake of everyone in this country, too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「顔のいい奴は大抵悪党っつったけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They say that good-looking guys are usually villains, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　もしかしていい奴かも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Maybe he's actually a good guy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君はちょろかった。
挨拶していきたいんだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to go greet her,
but is now a good time?"
you should also go say hello."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「香様は客人をもてなすのが好きだから、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so she will surely be pleased."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: cooperate in defeating the Demon Lord."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That said, I apologize, but for a short while,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: would it be alright to borrow Reset's help?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐに僕も君達の旅に参加すると約束しよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I promise I will join your journey immediately."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうやら乱義を仲間にするには、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems that to have Rangii join us,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This time it doesn't seem like something too dangerous!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺達も協力するぜって流れかと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought it was the flow where we also say we'll cooperate..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまで助けてもらうわけには……」

We'll fight together too, you know?"

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ehehe, it was just troublesome, you know."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、それにしてもすごかっただすだ、乱義様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, but even so, that was amazing, Lord Rangii."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれだけの強面の方々相手に、

既に僕は国主なのです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am already the lord of this country.

「見ているだけで！　この爺は、爺は！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Just watching! This old man, this old man!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……３Ｇ、そういうのを身内びいきと言うんだよ」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm still nowhere near Lady Kaoru's level.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「顔のいい奴は大抵悪党っつったけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They say that good-looking guys are usually villains, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　もしかしていい奴かも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Maybe he's actually a good guy..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長田君はちょろかった。
挨拶していきたいんだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to go greet her,
but is now a good time?"
you should also go say hello."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「香様は客人をもてなすのが好きだから、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so she will surely be pleased."
